B. Fancy - This option is not relevant to the situation and does not provide any information about what John might have been on.
C. Sandplain - This option is a possibility because a sandplain is a type of plain and could be connected to the ocean.
D. Cliff - This option is correct because a cliff is a steep rock face that could be found along the ocean, preventing John from going any farther.
E. Gorge - This option is not correct because a gorge is a deep, narrow valley and is not directly connected to the ocean.
